title: Falling for My Best Friend's Brother
description: Aiden Taylor.He’s devastatingly handsome, sexy, arrogant and he’s out of reach.He’s my best friend’s brother and the one man I can’t have.However, now that my best friend Liv is getting married, I’m seeing him more than ever.And he’s doing things to me that are making it hard for me to forget him.Or that night we had years ago.The night neither of us wants to talk about.The night I really want to talk about. We both vowed to keep our secret.It’s just getting harder and harder to keep it to myself.I need to come up with a plan. And I need to come up with it now because every weekend it’s getting harder and harder to tell myself that I’m not falling for my best friend’s brother.
author: J.S. Cooper
